roleset.name: a driving force

role.descr: impelled action, what arg1 is compelled to do/be

example.name: Args 0 and 2
example.text: My patient realized this and was able to overcome her compulsion to go to the mirror by paradoxically wishing, “Let my hair stand on end. Let it be a mess!"

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Comparison to compel.01, which maps to VN class force-59. No FN entry.

example.name: all args
example.text: Damon’s desire for Elena was obvious to everyone but Elena for a long time, and he’d do anything in order to keep her safe (and happy, hence his own thoughtful and beautiful confession of love and then his compulsion of her to forget).
